item.title: Grumpy Hackers
item.author: Rob Fuller
item.description: A little history A couple months ago @carnal0wnage, @bsdbandit and @theblindhacker (I’m sure I’ll get corrected if I’m wrong here) were at NoVAHackers just talking in the parking lot after the event and thought that it would be nice if they didn’t have to wait a month to have conversations like they were having each month out in the parking lot after the events. In passing @carnal0wnage told me about this and I set out to make it happen (for selfish reasons, I wanted to talk to them too).
